message1.text: Hmph, thou seemest like a Japanophile. And thou hast no manners to boot.

message2.text: (Translation: He called you a weeaboo with no manners.)

message3.text: In case thou art wondering who is I, that standeth before

message4.text: thee, my name is Balphogor of the Underworld full of the

message5.text: Undead and reigner of all-kinds-of-life... and a bit more!

message6.text: Thou shalt not come back freely from whence thou came.

message7.text: For I am going to purge the world of rude pathetic beings

message8.text: who do not know their place, such as thee! Mwahahahahaha!

victory.text: If you see this line contact Uri.
